ca.ualberta.cs.shinyexpensetracker.activities

Class MapViewActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.shinyexpensetracker.activities.MapViewActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osmdroid.bonuspack.overlays.MapEventsReceiver

    public class MapViewActivity
extends Activity
implements org.osmdroid.bonuspack.overlays.MapEventsReceiver
    This Activity lets Claimant set on a map by putting a marker. Geolocations can be chosen as a home geolocation for a user, while filling out information on a destination (mandatory), or while filling out information on an expense item (optional) Additionally, this activity lets the user view all geolocations stored on the device, when called from the appropriate menu option in ClaimListViewActivity

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        Handle back button press. If setting a geolocation, launch prompt asking user if they want to save the chosen location to the device or come back to the map Otherwise, exit the activity

      • singleTapConfirmedHelper

        public boolean singleTapConfirmedHelper(org.osmdroid.util.GeoPoint p)
        Handle short tap. Display a marker on the selected coordinates and generate a Toast telling the chosen location
